Restart Neon.tech PostgreSQL endpoint

Source: R/rdb.gen.R
restart_neon_ep.Rd

Restarts the Neon.tech PostgreSQL compute endpoint via the /projects/{project_id}/endpoints/{endpoint_id}/restart API endpoint.

Usage

restart_neon_ep(
  project_id = neon_project_id,
  endpoint_id = hostname_to_ep(pal::pkg_config_val(key = "pg_host", pkg = this_pkg)),
  api_key = pal::pkg_config_val(key = "neon_api_key", pkg = this_pkg),
  max_tries = 3L
)

Arguments

project_id

Neon.tech project identifier. A character scalar.

endpoint_id

Neon.tech compute endpoint identifier. A character scalar.

api_key

API key with sufficient access to the Neon.tech project_id.

max_tries

Maximum number of attempts to retry in case of an HTTP error. An integerish scalar.

Value

The HTTP response body as a list.

See also

Other administration functions: clean_attachment_bucket(), config_nocodb_tbls(), connect(), create_nocodb_tbl_cols(), create_nocodb_tbls(), delete_rfrnds(), dm(), notify_postgrest(), purge_nocodb(), reset_nocodb(), reset_rdb(), restart_postgrest(), update_administrative_units(), update_countries(), update_langs(), update_municipalities(), update_rfrnds(), update_subnational_entities(), update_tbl(), update_topics()
